data.text: @newsmax @DjokerNole Smart and healthy man. If the other fools are getting vaccinated then myocarditis will eventually take out about 25 to 40% of them. Brain hemorrhages will get about another 20%. Neurological disorders and various and sundry other maladies will get the rest. Fools.
@newsmax @DjokerNole I'm sure De Santis in FL will allow him.

@ceceyy @isaacdarcejohn @gazstratos @newsmax @DjokerNole HE. DOES. NOT. WANT. TO. GET. WAXED! It’s HIS risk he’s willing to take! Not to even mention he had covid and is now more protected than vaxxed! Why is that so hard to understand? If vax worked - why mandates? If vax doesn’t work - why mandates? THINK!

@isaacdarcejohn @gazstratos @newsmax @DjokerNole Study of summer’s Olympic athletes who reported no change after double vax. >80% ATP&WTA dbl-vaxxed w no sig reports. It’s ok if folks’d rather get Covid& risk Long Covidlike  a young athlete I know now waiting for a 🫁 xplant.  But entry reqs isn’t force.Just don’t come. Simple.

@ceceyy @gazstratos @newsmax @DjokerNole You don't know if their performance dropped. You don't know what they're hiding. Many were bullied into taking it. But we'll know in time. Extra delicate? No. He is weighing the risk to reward and it's not worth it for him.
@DMagdalene33 @newsmax @DjokerNole Read the tweet slowly-you'll figure it out, if not get a five year old to help.

@gazstratos @isaacdarcejohn @newsmax @DjokerNole And majority of atheletes performance haven't dropped. But sounds like Djokovic is extra-delicate. That's ok. That doesn't mean we change our rules for a non-citizen's guest entry into our country during a pandemic.
@big_mood_kicks @newsmax @DjokerNole Because free thinking people are a danger to governments
@newsmax @DjokerNole Good for him, not another waste of time like @AustralianOpen saga…
@big_mood_kicks @newsmax @DjokerNole Valid question. It’s more of he has shown himself as a non 🐑 and must be destroyed
